roleset.name: a type of MRI, used to examine the pancreatic duct and common bile duct

example.name: mrcp-n, ARG1
example.text: Of 89 who underwent MRCP , choledocholithiasis was demonstrated in 29 .
example.amr: (d / demonstrate-01 :ARG1 (d2 / disease-disorder :name (n / name :op1 "choledocholithiasis") :poss (p / person :quant 29 :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91 :ARG2 (p2 / person :quant 89 :ARG1-of (m / mrcp-01))))))

roleset.note: NOTES: Added for THYME-AMR. Need for additional PPT argument not anticipated (or thus far evidenced), since the specific body parts examined are subsumed by the meaning of the term itself.
